entries.title: any object: id
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdceany object: idtimes_12_biuosdce


The id uniquely identifies an object. In ViperCard, all objects will have different ids, even if they are different types or are on different cards.

If you put the long id of an object into a variable, you can use that variable to refer to the object.

monaco_9_biuosdceput the long id of card id 1011 into z
set the name of z to "changed"times_12_biuosdce

The short id of an object is just the number. For example the short id of card id 1011 is 1011.

monaco_9_biuosdceput the short id of card id 1011 into z
set the name of cd id z to "changed"times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: any object: name
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdceany object: nametimes_12_biuosdce


You can get or set the name of an object.
monaco_9_biuosdce
doMenu "New Button"
set the name of the result to "my new button"

set the name of cd btn id 1011 to "changed"
answer the short name of cd btn id 1011 -- "changed"
times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: any object: number
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdceany object: numbertimes_12_biuosdce


You can get the number of an object.
monaco_9_biuosdce
answer the number of cd fld 2 -- 2
answer the number of cd btn 3 -- 3
answer the number of card 4 -- 4
times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: any object: owner
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdceany object: ownertimes_12_biuosdce


Gets the parent object. Btns and flds belong to cards, cards belong to backgrounds, and backgrounds belong to the stack.

Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

put the owner of cd btn "myBtn" into z
set the name of the owner of cd btn "myBtn" to "changed"

times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: any object: script
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdceany object: scripttimes_12_biuosdce


It's unlikely to be useful, but a script can dynamically change the contents of another script.
Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

put return & "on newCode" & return & "answer 234" & \
    return & "end newCode" into newCode
put the script of cd btn id 123 into oldCode
set the script of cd btn id 123 to oldCode & newCode
send "newCode" to cd btn id 123

times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: btn: autohilite
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcebtn: autohilitetimes_12_biuosdce


Does the button turn black when you click on it?

Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

put the autohilite of cd btn "myBtn" into z


times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: btn: checkmark
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcebtn: checkmarktimes_12_biuosdce



Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

set the checkmark of cd btn "myBtn" to true.

times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: btn: enabled
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcebtn: enabledtimes_12_biuosdce


If a button is not enabled, it is greyed out and can't be clicked.

Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

set the enabled of cd btn "myBtn" to true
set the enabled of cd btn "myBtn" to false


times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: btn: left
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcebtn: lefttimes_12_biuosdce


The x coordinate of the top left corner of the object, in pixels. I.e. the distance from the left of the screen to the object.

Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

set the left of cd btn "myBtn" to 4


times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: btn: loc, location
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcebtn: loc, locationtimes_12_biuosdce


The coordinates of the center of the object.
Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

put the location of cd btn "myBtn" into z


times_12_biuosdce

entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcebtn: heighttimes_12_biuosdce


The height of the object on screen, in pixels.
Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

put the height of cd btn "myBtn" into z


times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: btn: hilite
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcebtn: hilitetimes_12_biuosdce



Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

put the hilite of cd btn "myBtn" into z

entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcebtn: labeltimes_12_biuosdce



Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

put the label of cd btn "myBtn" into z

entries.title: btn: icon
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcebtn: icontimes_12_biuosdce


Number of the icon.
Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

put the icon of cd btn "myBtn" into z

times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: btn: rect, rectangle
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcebtn: rect, rectangletimes_12_biuosdce


Four numbers representing the left, top, bottom, and right coordinates. I.e. the first two numbers are the coordinates of the top left corner, and the last two numbers are the coordinates of the bottom right corner.
Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

set the rect of cd btn "myBtn" to 45,56,67,78
set the rectangle of cd btn "myBtn" to 45,56,67,78


times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: btn: showlabel
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcebtn: showlabeltimes_12_biuosdce


Is the label text shown?
Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

put the showlabel of cd btn "myBtn" into z

times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: btn: style
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcebtn: styletimes_12_biuosdce


Styles include:
Transparent
Rectangle
Opaque
Roundrect
Plain
Shadow
OsStandard
OsDefault
OsBoxmodal
Checkbox
Radio

Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

set the style of cd btn "myBtn" to "Shadow"

times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: btn: textalign
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcebtn: textaligntimes_12_biuosdce


Set alignment of the label text.
Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

set the textalign of cd btn "myBtn" to "left"
set the textalign of cd btn "myBtn" to "center"


times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: btn: textfont
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcebtn: textfonttimes_12_biuosdce


Set typeface of the label text.

Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

set the textfont of cd btn "myBtn" to "courier"


times_12_biuosdce

entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcebtn: textsizetimes_12_biuosdce


Set size of the label text.

Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

set the textsize of cd btn "myBtn" to 24


times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: btn: textstyle
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcebtn: textstyletimes_12_biuosdce


Set style of the label text.

Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

set the textstyle of cd btn "myBtn" to "bold"


times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: btn: top
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcebtn: toptimes_12_biuosdce


The y coordinate of the top left corner of the object, in pixels. I.e. the distance from the top of the screen to the object.
Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

put the top of cd btn "myBtn" into z



times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: btn: topleft
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcebtn: toplefttimes_12_biuosdce


The x,y coordinates of the upper left corner.
Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

set the topleft of cd btn "myBtn" to 34, 56

times_12_biuosdce

entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcebtn: visibletimes_12_biuosdce

entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcebtn: widthtimes_12_biuosdce


The width of the object on screen, in pixels.
Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

put the width of cd btn "myBtn" into z


times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: fld: alltext
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcefld: alltexttimes_12_biuosdce


Get or set all contents of the field.
Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

put the alltext of cd fld "myFld" into z


times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: fld: dontwrap
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcefld: dontwraptimes_12_biuosdce


Wrap text onto different lines.
Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: fld: enabled
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcefld: enabledtimes_12_biuosdce


A disabled field is greyed out and can't be edited.
Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

put the enabled of cd fld "myFld" into z

times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: fld: defaulttextfont
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcefld: defaulttextfonttimes_12_biuosdce



If the user deletes all text in a field and then types a letter, the font of this letter will be determined by the defaulttextfont.

Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

put the defaulttextfont of cd fld "myFld" into z


times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: fld: defaulttextsize
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcefld: defaulttextsizetimes_12_biuosdce



If the user deletes all text in a field and then types a letter, the size of this letter will be determined by the defaulttextsize.

Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

put the defaulttextsize of cd fld "myFld" into z

times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: fld: defaulttextstyle
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcefld: defaulttextstyletimes_12_biuosdce



If the user deletes all text in a field and then types a letter, the style of this letter will be determined by the defaulttextstyle.

Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

put the defaulttextstyle of cd fld "myFld" into z


times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: fld: left
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcefld: lefttimes_12_biuosdce


The x coordinate of the top left corner of the object, in pixels. I.e. the distance from the left of the screen to the object.
Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

set the left of cd fld "myFld" to 4


times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: fld: loc, location
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcefld: loc, locationtimes_12_biuosdce


The coordinates of the center of the object.
Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

put the location of cd fld "myFld" into z


times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: fld: locktext
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcefld: locktexttimes_12_biuosdce


You can't type new text into a 'locked' field. You can still set the contents via a script.
Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

set the locktext of cd fld "myFld" to true
put "still can change" into cd fld "myFld"

times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: fld: height
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcefld: heighttimes_12_biuosdce


The height of the object on screen, in pixels.
Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

put the height of cd fld "myFld" into z

times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: fld: rect, rectangle
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcefld: rect, rectangletimes_12_biuosdce


Four numbers representing the left, top, bottom, and right coordinates. I.e. the first two numbers are the coordinates of the top left corner, and the last two numbers are the coordinates of the bottom right corner.
Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

set the rect of cd fld "myFld" to 45,56,67,78
set the rectangle of cd fld "myFld" to 45,56,67,78


times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: fld: scroll
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcefld: scrolltimes_12_biuosdce


The vertical scroll position.
Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

put the scroll of cd fld "myFld" into z

times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: fld: singleline
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcefld: singlelinetimes_12_biuosdce


Field is a single line, cannot contain newlines.
Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

put the singleline of cd fld "myFld" into z



times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: fld: style
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcefld: styletimes_12_biuosdce


Styles include:
Opaque
Transparent
Rectangle
Shadow
Scrolling

Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

set the style of cd fld "myFld" to "shadow"

times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: fld: textalign
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcefld: textaligntimes_12_biuosdce


Set alignment of text
Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

set the textalign of cd fld "myFld" to "left"
set the textalign of cd fld "myFld" to "center"


times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: fld: textfont
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcefld: textfonttimes_12_biuosdce



By default, applies the property to the entire field.
monaco_9_biuosdceset the textfont of cd fld "myFld" to "chicago"
put the textfont of cd fld "myFld" into ztimes_12_biuosdce

We now support getting and setting by chunk!
monaco_9_biuosdceset the textfont of char 3 to 4 of cd fld "myFld" to "geneva"
put the textfont of char 3 to 4 of cd fld "myFld" into ztimes_12_biuosdce

When querying for a property and there are multiple values, returns the string "mixed".

entries.title: fld: textsize
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcefld: textsizetimes_12_biuosdce



By default, applies the property to the entire field.
monaco_9_biuosdceset the textsize of cd fld "myFld" to "chicago"
put the textsize of cd fld "myFld" into ztimes_12_biuosdce

We now support getting and setting by chunk!
monaco_9_biuosdceset the textsize of char 3 to 4 of cd fld "myFld" to "geneva"
put the textsize of char 3 to 4 of cd fld "myFld" into ztimes_12_biuosdce

When querying for a property and there are multiple values, returns the string "mixed".

entries.title: fld: textstyle
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcefld: textstyletimes_12_biuosdce



By default, applies the property to the entire field.
monaco_9_biuosdceset the textstyle of cd fld "myFld" to "bold"
set the textstyle of cd fld "myFld" to "bold,italic"
set the textstyle of cd fld "myFld" to "plain"
put the textstyle of cd fld "myFld" into ztimes_12_biuosdce

We now support getting and setting by chunk!
monaco_9_biuosdceset the textstyle of char 3 to 4 of cd fld "myFld" to "bold"
put the textstyle of char 3 to 4 of cd fld "myFld" into ztimes_12_biuosdce

When querying for a property and there are multiple values, returns the string "mixed".

The y coordinate of the top left corner of the object, in pixels. I.e. the distance from the top of the screen to the object.
Examples:

put the top of cd fld "myFld" into z

entries.body:

entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcefld: widthtimes_12_biuosdce


The width of the object on screen, in pixels.
Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

put the width of cd fld "myFld" into z

times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: fld: visible
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdcefld: visibletimes_12_biuosdce


Show or hide the object.
Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

put the visible of cd fld "myFld" into z


times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: global: cursor
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdceglobal: cursortimes_12_biuosdce


Sets the current cursor.

Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

-- show the watch
set the cursor to "watch"
wait 2 seconds

-- spinning ball
repeat with x = 1 to 30
    set the cursor to "busy"
    wait 0.2 seconds
end repeat

put the cursor into x


times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: global: filled
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdceglobal: filledtimes_12_biuosdce


The color/opacity for drawing. Currently can be "true" for black, "false" for transparent, or "white" for white.

entries.title: global: lineColor
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdceglobal: lineColortimes_12_biuosdce


The lineColor for drawing. Currently can be 0 (black) or 1 (white).

entries.title: global: lineSize
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdceglobal: lineSizetimes_12_biuosdce


The linesize for drawing. Currently can be 1 (thin) or 2 (thicker).

entries.title: global: itemdelimiter
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdceglobal: itemdelimitertimes_12_biuosdce



Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

put the itemdelimiter into z
set the itemdel to tab
answer item 2 of "a"&tab&"b"&tab&"c"
set the itemdel to ","


times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: global: idlerate
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdceglobal: idleratetimes_12_biuosdce



Examples:
monaco_9_biuosdce

set the idlerate to "default"
set the idlerate to "faster"

times_12_biuosdce

entries.title: global: multiple
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdceglobal: multipletimes_12_biuosdce


The "draw multiple" setting for drawing. Does not yet affect script drawing.

entries.title: global: pattern
entries.body:
times_12_biuosdcetimes_24_biuosdceglobal: patterntimes_12_biuosdce


The current pattern number.
